name: Neo Monstrum: Origins
storyline:
A homunculus made by an evil organization, Neo was raised to be the perfect hitman. He grew up being curious about the meaning of life instead and couldn't bring himself to harm anyone.

Guide Neo on his way to freedom or maybe..

.. you know..

.. break him if that's what you're into.
summary: Neo Monstrum - Origins is a fully voiced, interactive mystery visual novel that steps into the origins of our main character, Neo.
